name: $draft
desc: The plan is intended to be followed and used as part of patient care.

name: $active
desc: The plan has been temporarily stopped but is expected to resume in the future.

name: $suspended
desc: The plan is no longer in use and is not expected to be followed or used in patient care.

name: $completed
desc: The plan was entered in error and voided.

name: $entered-in-error
desc: The plan has been terminated prior to reaching completion (though it may have been replaced by a new plan).

name: $cancelled
desc: The authoring system doesn't know the current state of the care plan.
